arStrings.szText: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, you drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} and Dodge the next {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} attacks within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds. This effect can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
